item.title: Scaling Correlation Strategies to the NASDAQ for Earnings Trades
item.description: Pure Earnings Play 2 Correlation Reviewing different versions Top pairs from results Beautiful plots to visualize the results Quick review In a previous post Scaling a Simple Earnings Strategy to the NASDAQ Exchange, I backtested a simple earnings strategy and analyzed the results across all stocks in the NASDAQ with a market cap above $5 Billion. While writing that post, I created a correlation plot which sparked the idea of writing someday writing a continuation post by backtesting an earnings trade on only the highly correlated stocks.
